frontmatter.title: ConsenSys Academy
frontmatter.summary: ConsenSys Academy’s mission is to develop the global blockchain ecosystem by bridging the Ethereum knowledge gap and being a beacon for Ethereum education. They offer a suite of offerings, both free and paid, to educate web 2 and web 3 developers about Ethereum and related technologies. They have offerings for non-developers as well.
